summary: When a terrorist bombing in North Africa kills 19 incl. an American, an Egyptian chemical engineer flying from South Africa to his wife in USA, is arrested upon arriving USA. He disappears. His wife asks senator for help.
cast: Jake Gyllenhaal|Reese Witherspoon|Meryl Streep|Alan Arkin|Peter Sarsgaard|Omar Metwally|Igal Naor|Hadar Ratzon Rotem|J.K. title: Expediente Anwar
